sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' const Usuario = () => { const [usuario, setUsuario] = useState([]) const {id} = useParams() const getUserData = async() => { const resp = await axios.get(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/${id}/`) const user = await resp.data setUsuario(user) console.log(user) } useEffect( () => { getUserData() }, []) return (

{usuario.name}

San Francisco, USA

email@example.com
www.jquery2dotnet.com
June 02, 1988

  • Twitter
  • Google +
  • Facebook
  • Github
) } export default Usuario
